column4: hey... can anybody help me a little here
i'm having trouble with some ubuntu's applications
opening gedit with an html file causes gedit to crash
i type from a terminal #gedit file.html &
and gedit opens partially, then crashes
anybody has a similar problem?
about crashes?
does it give you errors?
does it do it with all files?
if you turn those features off does it still crash?
check .xsession-errors, don't know what else to tell you.  Haven't seen that kind of behavior before
something curious:
what if you run 'gedit file.html' without the &, do you then get some output on the terminal?
if I had to guess I would say working directory, but I have no clue
but still no output to the terminal?
any ideas...?
forget about gedit and use vim :)
do you happen to know where does it send the bug report?
oh, I thought it sent it on its own
yeap it uses sendmail to send it, but I can send it manually too
probably gnome's bugzilla
hi
